name: A Philosophical And Practical Treatise On Representing Entire In Game States On Decentralized Ledgers And Also The True Nature Of Reality
description:
Have you ever woke up in the middle of the night in a cold sweat, ran to the bathroom mirror, looked at yourselfâ€“fingers bloody from writing forge invariant tests, eyes strained from reading bottom-right-screen-tiny-font phaser metrics, and asked yourself why, why, why must it all be onchain, before finally drifting off thinking about how your lazy updates can be done in constant time?

Well then, anon, this is the talk for you.
